\caption{Double differential cross-section ${\d^2\sigma}/{\d\Omega\d E_3}$ in $eD$ scattering
plotted as a function of the hadronic invariant mass $W$.
Adapted with permission from
J.~S. Poucher {\em et~al.}, ``{High-energy single-arm inelastic $e - p$ and $e - d$
  scattering at 6-degrees and 10-degrees},'' {\em Phys. Rev. Lett.}, vol.~32,
  p.~118, 1974.}
\end{center}
\end{figure}
